direct_answer.text: To find the remaining amount of food immediately after cooking, subtract the used portion before starting dinner service: Total original stock (x) minus consumed part beforehand ((1/n)*(Total Original Stock)), so Remaining Food Quantity Equals (Total Original Stock) - [(1/(whole Number))*(Original Portion)]
